thread.section_title: The Roosevelt Hotel - UPDATED 2017 Reviews & Price Comparison (New York City) - TripAdvisor
thread.title: Nice midtown option
thread.title_full: Nice midtown option - Review of The Roosevelt Hotel, New York City, NY - TripAdvisor

author: bus_traveler_c
title: Nice midtown option
text:
I have stayed at the Roosevelt on several occasions when I had to travel in to NYC on short notice and found that my preferred hotel close to my office was fully booked. I've never been disappointed by the decision to go with the Roosevelt. The staff is friendly, the rooms are reasonably nice for the price, and the location close to Grand Central is convenient. I've had dinner at the bar a few times and found the food to be very good. The bar staff is a bit unfriendly for my taste but I think I could say that about bartenders at several other NYC bars as well so not a big deal.
Overall, worth a look if you're in town and are looking for decent accommodations at a reasonable price.
